content:
Brett and I prepared US Core Block Vote #1 for this Thursday's August 15th 11-12 AM ET HL7 Structured Documents call. These 30 items are tracker items on US Core and represent many issues discussed on the Argonaut R4 Project Calls as well as other trackers brought up by members of the HL7 community. Where applicable we have provided links to the proposed changes so you can view the actual changes in the context of the guide.

Note that this block vote is part of an STU update of US Core in preparation for the proposed ONC U.S. Core Data for Interoperability (USCDI). The Road Map for the STU update is as follows:

  • Review and reconcile 30+ US Core gForge trackers - 8/22
  • Publish fixed STU update version of IG - 9/3
  • 2 week comment period - 9/3-9/174
  • Reconcile STU comments - 9/26 -10/10
  • Publish Final Content- 10/24

As you can see it is compressed timeline and as such the cut off for addressing any new US Core comments (excepting those currently being discussed on the Argonaut calls) is the end of this week. ( Also note that we will be doing editorial QA on the ig prior to publishing to eliminate bad links and typos so rather than creating trackers on those directly email either Brett or myself)

Please respond to this stream if you want to remove an item from the block vote to discuss on the call or if there is a particular comment you want to make regarding a proposed disposition.

Comment Submitters

  • Brett Marquard
  • Eric Haas
  • Hans Buitendijk
  • Ioana Singureanu
  • Jason Walonoski
  • Jay Lyle
  • Kensaku Kawamoto
  • Linda Michaelsen
  • Lisa Anderson
  • Nick George
  • Patty Craig
  • Robert McClure
  • Saul Kravitz
  • Terrie Reed

Line Items

1. GF#20901 Adopt restricted set of manifestations (Jay Lyle) Considered - No action required
2. GF#20526 Need a unified code set%28s%29 to use in Encounters for encounters which are not covered by E%26M codes%2C like hospitalizations (Linda Michaelsen) Considered - Question Answered
3. GF#20527 Inability to identify a principal procedure (Lisa Anderson) In Person Considered - Question Answered
4. GF#21066 Directories of Published US Core Versions are not showing published version list (Linda Michaelsen) Considered - Question Answered
5. GF#22124 General Device Profie (Hans Buitendijk) In Person Considered - Question Answered
6. GF#22125 De-Identified Device Profile (Hans Buitendijk) In Person Considered - Question Answered
7. GF#22621 US Core Synthea Examples (Jason Walonoski) Considered - Question Answered
8. GF#22781 Strange to have repeated Coding with bound system on US Core extensions (Nick George) Considered - Question Answered
9. GF#20571 Add a Coverage Profile to US Core to Support Interactions with Payers (Linda Michaelsen) Considered for Future Use
10. GF#21302 update CCDS table to USCDI table in Guidance section (Eric Haas)
11. GF#22753 Add language support guidance (Eric Haas)
12. GF#21208 US Core Profiles - missing comma (Patty Craig) Persuasive
13. GF#22275 remove comment about date based search from home page (Eric Haas) Persuasive
14. GF#22276 update guidance on when source has no data (Eric Haas) Persuasive
15. GF#22750 Remove extra patient search syntax from US Core (Eric Haas) Persuasive
16. GF#22751 Add med list guidance and update MedRequest profile to support med list (Eric Haas) Persuasive
17. GF#22754 Provide guidance on Search filters and hidden default values by EHRs (Eric Haas) Persuasive
18. GF#22755 Add R2 to R4 conversion and guidance (Eric Haas) Persuasive
19. GF#22756 Add SHALL support multipleOR on Statuses (Eric Haas) Persuasive
20. GF#22771 Update Organization requirements to support more than just provider directory (Brett Marquard) Persuasive
21. GF#22772 change careplan slice disciminator from pattern to slice for easier reading in diff (Eric Haas) Persuasive
22. GF#22806 Update US Core DocumentReference.identifier to 0..%2A (Brett Marquard) Persuasive
23. GF#22853 Add SNOMED back to Encounter Type Value Set (Brett Marquard) Persuasive
24. GF#23006 Update Us Core Allergy Substance to match VSAC Definition (Brett Marquard) Persuasive
25. GF#19796 Clarify that this US Core Device profile is actually %22US Core Implanted Device Profile%22 rather than a generic %22US Core Device%22... (Ioana Singureanu) In Person Persuasive with Mod
26. GF#22488 review vocabulary to align with CCDA (Robert McClure) In Person Persuasive with Mod
27. GF#22901 Update Device Intro and Examples per FDA (Terrie Reed) Persuasive with Mod
28. GF#23041 us-core-practitionerrole%3A change cardinality of code %28role%29 from 0..1 to 1..%2A (Saul Kravitz) Persuasive with Mod
29. GF#23053 US Core Procedure Code Value Set Description and Content Don%27t Match (Kensaku Kawamoto) Persuasive with Mod

also will be discussing this item separately

1. GF#20616 Add FIO2 to vitals as listed in USCDI v1 (Eric Haas) Persuasive with Mod

will be discussing on voting on these items on this Thursday August 22nd 11-12 AM ET HL7 Structured Documents Call:

1. GF#22751 Add med list guidance and update MedRequest profile to support med list (Eric Haas) Persuasive
2. GF#22772 change careplan slice disciminator from pattern to slice for easier reading in diff (Eric Haas) Not Persuasive
